strategy: Adopt a conditional mixed strategy based on the observed history of the column player's actions. If the column player has previously chosen "Fight" in the last two rounds, increase the probability of choosing "Accord" to 0.7; otherwise, maintain a baseline probability of 0.5 for "Accord" and 0.5 for "Fight". This strategy leverages behavioral patterns and anticipates the column player's preferences through adaptive reinforcement learning.
